class rigel.plugins.core.test.models.PluginModel(*, components: List[TestComponent])[source]

Bases: BaseModel

components: List[TestComponent]
class rigel.plugins.core.test.models.TestComponent(*, name: str, image: str, introspection: Introspection | None = None)[source]

Bases: BaseModel

A placeholder for information regarding a containerized ROS package to include in the testing.

Parameters:

  • image (string) – The Docker image.

  • name (string) – The Docker container name.

  • instrospection (Instrospection.) – Information regarding test conditions.

  • _kwargs (Dict[str, Any]) – Keyword arguments. Consult the documentation for more information

(https://gabrieldemarmiesse.github.io/python-on-whales/sub-commands/container/ - run function)

image: str
introspection: Introspection | None
name: str

Plugin entrypoint. Create simulation network and all containers required for a given simulation.

run_package_container(component: TestComponent, master: str) → Container | None[source]

Launch a single containerized ROS node.

Parameters:

  • master (str) – The IP address of the ROS MASTER.

Return type:

docker.models.containers.Container

The Docker container serving as ROS master.
